narration: Your phone's GPS only works because of Einstein. Satellites move so fast their clocks drift thirty eight microseconds every day. Sounds tiny? Without correction, your location would shift ten kilometers daily. Every time you open Google Maps, you're using a theory from nineteen fifteen. Einstein didn't just change physics. He changed your commute.
